price: So We destroyed them, although they were greater in might than these [Pagans][4], and the stories of the earlier nations have already been related[5].
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes:
[4] Of the Quraysh.
 [5] Such as the people of Noah, Lot, Shu’ayb and other nations who were destroyed.
